Entries.Danger: Danger! Enter the labyrinth at your own risk!

Entries.CursedBones: Darn! These cursed bones blocking the way into the mines seem to have been here for a while... Perhaps someone in town knows more?

Entries.Xaliburn: The one who pulls this sword from stone will be crowned ki... well not quite king but you'll certainly have an easier time in the mines...

Entries.DRGY_01: It reads: 'Here lies Durin. First of his name. Slayer of darkness and bane of shadows.' This must be who the town was named after!

Entries.DRGY_02: It reads: 'Here lies Durin Shadowbane The Second. Slayer of hearts and bane of fair maidens.' I wonder who's heart he broke...?

Entries.DRGY_03: It reads: 'Here lies Durin Shadowbane The Third. Hero of The Elemental Wars and master farmer.' I bet the term 'Hero' would seem subjective to the Shadow People...

Entries.DRGY_04: Here lies 'Durin Shadowbane' The Fourth. It looks like the titles have yet to be filled in, this must be where our current Durin is due to be burried...

Entries.DRGY_05: It's too old and worn out to be able to make out what it says...

Entries.DRGY_06: It reads: 'Here lies General Stronghammer. Father, Son, Warrior.' I wonder what he did to get a grave so close to the Durin family line?

Entries.DRGY_07: It reads: 'Here lies Commander Redaxe. ------ -----.' Something has been scratched out here, I wonder what it was?

Entries.DRGY_08: It reads: 'Here lies a faithful dwarven warrior. He fought hard, but unfortunately he was a little short on intelligence.'

Entries.DRGY_09: It reads: 'Here lies the body of one of Durin's faithful servants. Nobody is exactly sure what services she provided...'

Entries.DRGY_10: It reads: 'Here lies the body of one of Durin's earlier advisors. His recommendation that Durin's Rest should be alcohol-free led to his unfortunate demise...'

Entries.DRGY_11: It reads: 'Here lies a brave dwarf who died defending the ones he cared for most.'

Entries.DRGY_12: It reads: 'Here lies a fearless dwarf who fought to save the ones he loved.'

Entries.DRGY_13: It reads: 'Here lies a intrepid dwarf who fought to defend his realm from the shadows.'

Entries.DRFarmHouseLocked: Warning! Private Property. No Entrance Allowed.

Entries.DRShamanHouse: The door is locked from the other side with boxes piled in front. Strange noises are coming from within... Someone Clearly doesn't want you coming in... I wonder who lives here?

Entries.TempleStatue: An ancient statue depicting some important elven figure. A Queen perhaps?

Entries.TempleStatue2: An ancient statue depicting two elven women holding hands. Maybe depicting some pact or alliance?

Entries.DRPubDoorLocked: It's locked... And the knob is dusty... What's that smell?

Entries.Durin: Oh my!! This is pure dead brilliant @! This will go great in my beard oil!/432 436 438/That looks mighty fine! Raise a wee glass in me grandpappy's name and lets get good and proper bevvied!/348 303 346 459 373 279 797 74 446/Failin' means yer playin'...//What do ya take me for? A scabby tube?//Oi bruv! Ye best be watching yer step if ya give me that trash again!//

Entries.Durin0: My farmin' ancestors would be so proud of me moving to a farm.#$e#I can't wait to brew us a wee batch of marriage mead!
Entries.Durin1: Are you sure yer well and fine with one of my kind moving to yer human village?#$b#I feel a wee bit mad for even considereing this but then yer smile pops into my head and any worry melts away!#$b#I think I'll be running my shop remotely now.

Entries.winter_1: Dwarven Whiskey is, by far, the most popular of all remedies that will not cure a cold...[{{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Dwarven Whiskey}}]$h

Entries.Durin: Oh my, so many flowers around... This is Glorgan's paradise!#$b#I wonder if I could make mead out of any of these flowers...

Entries.Tenebra: This is a lovely gift. I receive this on behalf of all shadow people./72 412 305 308 418/This is actually quite nice, thank you./66 336 340 373 279 797 74 446/Humans have... interesting tastes./-7 -81 2 330/Oh... Yikes. I'll see if my friend 'The Cave Floor' wants this...//Gross.//

Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. You must be from that human town... Perhaps you've met my sister Umbra?
Entries.fall_Thu: I wonder what my sister Umbra is up to?

Entries.Arwen: Oh my @! This is lovely! I'll be thinking of you when I'm using this later.../105 272 78 119 91 148 239 412 372/Hey, thanks @! I can definitely make use of this./459 220 233 104 122 121 373 279 797 74 446/Hmmm... thank you @. I wonder what I will do with this...//I do appreciate the thought @. But, I don't really like this...//Thanks for thinking of me @, but maybe think a little harder next time...//

Entries.Arwen0: It's been centuries since I was married. I am so happy I found someone who makes me feel young again.
Entries.Arwen1: What does it mean to be a farmer's wife?#$b#Whatever it is, if it's with you I'll be happy!#$b#I think I'll be running my shop remotely now.

Entries.Arwen: It's a little weird being around this many humans. But you make me feel right at home.#$b#I don't think anyone has noticed the ears yet. Maybe they think it's a costume for the dance?

Entries.Balor: Oh wow this is for me? Really? Thanks @! Next time I take a trip into the mountains I'll take this!/257 281 404 420 422 851 891/Thanks @! I can definitely use this!/373 279 797 74 446 -74 -19 -4/I don't really need this...//Right... I guess I'll take it. Almost anything can be fertilizer if I try hard enough.//Are ya just giving this to me because ya don't know what to do with it either?//

Entries.Glorgan: Oh my goodness! This is for me? It's absolutely beautiful @, Thank you!/337 910 -80 376 22 418 283 18/Hey, thanks! I can definitely make use of this./373 279 797 74 446 -15 -12 -2/Oh, for me? Oh... I... Thanks.../2 4 25 75 76 77 95 290 343 390 450 668 670 751 760 762 764 765 816 817 818 819 843 844 845 846 847 849 850 382 330 80/Yeah, nah, thanks though.//Oh come on not this again. Who told you I liked this?//

Entries.Glorgan0: We're to be wed! This is mighty fine news!#$b#So many flowers to think about, which ones shall I place at the wedding?#$b#I'm sure I'll come up with something fantastic!
Entries.Glorgan1: Are you sure yer well and fine with one of my kind moving to yer human village?#$b#I feel a wee bit mad for even considereing this but then yer smile pops into my head and any worry melts away!#$b#I think I'll be running my shop remotely now.

Entries.Glorgan: Oh my... All these beautiful flowers! I'm in paradise!#$b#What is this thing about again? Do we all vote on the best flower? Because if so, I think it's you!

Entries.Edrus: I'm speechless, you're very kind @, Thank you!/440 444 446/Oh wow, I really like this, thank you @!/373 279 797 74/Oh, sure, yeah thanks!//I actively dislike this gift.//Well this is just awful...//

Entries.2272: Silver Snowtail/100/5/Fish -4/Silver Snowtail/Often found in the sleepy ponds and lakes of Durin's Rest. Its silver tail often tricks children into thinking it's valuable.

Entries.2273: Golden Snowtail/800/5/Fish -4/Golden Snowtail/Rarely found in the sleepy ponds and lakes of Durin's Rest. Unlike its silver cousin, this golden variety sells for a pretty penny, or dabloon, a pretty doubloon.

Entries.2274: Rested Cod/180/10/Fish -4/Rested Cod/This freshwater pollock has a distinctly strong underbite and white belly. Low in fat with exceptionally tender and juicy flesh, it makes a fantastic everyday fish!

Entries.2275: Rested Salmon/340/15/Fish -4/Rested Salmon/Tipped with a distinctly hooked mouth, this long deep red freshwater king provides enough meat for at least two families!

Entries.2276: Blind Barracuda/440/8/Fish -4/Blind Barracuda/Don't be fooled by the fact that it's completely blind from it's time away from the sun, this fierce hunter is nothing to mess with.

Entries.2277: Shady Shad/390/10/Fish -4/Shady Shad/Unlike its cousin, the Shady Shad spends the entirety of its time in secluded shady pools.

Entries.123452100: continue/-10 -10/farmer -100 -10 1/message "You've had a very strange dream filled with stout, sturdy folk fighting off horrifically disfigured zombie-like creatures inhabiting a remote town. Perhaps someone at the museum might know where to start decoding the creepy imagery you were so rudely confronted with... "/fade unfade/addMailReceived DurinsRestStart/end

Entries.DwarvenMediumMalter: Hi @,^Great job!^^Here is the recipe for the Dwarven Medium Malter.^^Cheers & Happy Brewing!^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Dwarven_Medium_Malter %%[#]Dwarven Medium Malter
Entries.DwarvenMashTun: Hi @,^Great job!^^Here is the recipe for the Dwarven Mash Tun.^^Cheers & Happy Brewing!^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Dwarven_Mash_Tun %%[#]Dwarven Mash Tun
Entries.DwarvenLauterTun: Hi @,^Great job!^^Here is the recipe for the Dwarven Lauter Tun.^^Cheers & Happy Brewing!^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Dwarven_Lauter_Tun %%[#]Dwarven Lauter Tun
Entries.DwarvenKettle: Hi @,^Great job!^^Here is the recipe for the Dwarven Kettle.^^Cheers & Happy Brewing!^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Dwarven_Kettle %%[#]Dwarven Kettle
Entries.DwarvenFermenter: Hi @,^Great job!^^Here is the recipe for the Dwarven Fermenter.^^Cheers & Happy Brewing!^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Dwarven_Fermenter %%[#]Dwarven Fermenter
Entries.DwarvenLightMalter: Hi @,^Great job!^^Here is the recipe for the Dwarven Light Malter.^^Cheers & Happy Brewing!^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Dwarven_Light_Malter %%[#]Dwarven Light Malter
Entries.DwarvenDarkMalter: Hi @,^Great job!^^Here is the recipe for the Dwarven Dark Malter.^^Cheers & Happy Brewing!^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Dwarven_Dark_Malter %%[#]Dwarven Dark Malter
Entries.DwarvenStill: Hi @,^Great job!^^Here is the recipe for the Dwarven Still.^Mix 'Dwarven Barley Wort (Light)' with 'Dwarven Potato Wort' in the Dwarven Kettle to make 'Clear Dwarven Vodka Wort' and put that in the Dwarven Fermenter to make 'Dwarven Pre-Vodka'.^^Cheers & Happy Distilling!^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Dwarven_Still %%[#]Dwarven Still
Entries.DurinsRestHouseUnlocked: Hi @!^Let me welcome you as the newest resident in Durin's Rest!^^Here is a bed to show our hospitality. Place it wherever you like inside your new home and feel free to start decorating with any other furniture you might have!^^-Durin%item furniture 2048 %%[#]A Welcoming Bed
Entries.DurinsRestFridge: Hi @!^^You may want somewhere to store all the crops and treats you've harvested and cooked...^^Here is a fridge!^Place it wherever you like inside your new home!^^-Durin%item bigobject 216 %%[#]A Welcoming Fridge
Entries.DurinsRestWarpTotem: Hi @!^^Sorry 'bout the odd dreams... Me old friend said you'd be stoppin' by soon. To make ya journey easier. In case you lose the one I gave ya, here is the recipe for a wee little totem that will help you get to us quick as a lick.^^-Durin%item craftingRecipe Warp_Totem:_Durin's_Rest %%[#]A Dwarvish Surprise
Entries.DwarvenGreenhouseUnlocked: Day 1279,^^'Only when I return home, put down the axe, and take up the hoe, will I trully be a champion'^^-Durin the third[#]Durin The Third's War Diary

Entries.123452002/l DurinsRiddle1Solved:
continue/7 10/farmer 7 10 1 Tenebra 8 10 3/faceDirection 2 1/speak Tenebra "You must be @.  How did you make it through the labyrinth? You've proven your brawn, lets test your brain with 3 riddles... You will get one attempt each day.",
			/speak Tenebra "$q -1 null#How many letters are in the dwarven alphabet?
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option1#26
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option1#27
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option2#18",
			pause 2000/fork DurinsRiddle1/end
Entries.123452003/n DurinsRiddle1Solved/l Durins:
continue/7 10/farmer 7 10 1 Tenebra 8 10 3/faceDirection 2 1/speak Tenebra "Hmm... well then @, you may be worthy of entering our secret shady village after all... 2 riddles left!",
			/speak Tenebra "$q -1 null#Voiceless it cries, wingless it flutters...         Toothless it bites, mouthless it mutters...        
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option2#Wind
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option1#Cold
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option1#Sadness",
			pause 2000/fork DurinsRiddle2/end
Entries.123452004/n DurinsRiddle2Solved/l Durins:
continue/7 10/farmer 7 10 1 Tenebra 8 10 3/faceDirection 2 1/speak Tenebra "Impossible... Well done @, you've proven yourself smarter than most humans. One more correct answer and you may pass into our secret shady paradise...",
			/speak Tenebra "$q -1 null#All things it devours. Birds, beasts, flowers...    Gnaws iron, bites steel, grinds stone to meal...    Slays kings, ruins towns, & beats mountains down...
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option1#Fire
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option1#Plague
			#$r -1 0 DurinsRiddle_option2#Time",
			pause 2000/fork DurinsRiddle3/end

Entries.123452001: continue/13 17/farmer 13 17 0 Durin 13 15 2/faceDirection 2 1/speak Durin "Greetings human. We haven't seen yer kind around here in some time. How did ya get here?#$b#Anyways... Welcome to Durin's Rest!#$b#We're a humble farming community who loves to see new farmers join our ranks! $l",pause 1000/end position 13 17/faceDirection 0 3/addMailReceived HasMetDurin/end

Entries.123455000: ItemDelivery/Dwarven Hospitality/Prove you have a silver tongue. Get to know everyone in Durin's Rest and Durin will give you the keys to the old farmstead south of town!/Get to one heart with Arwen, Balor, Durin, Edrus, & Glorgan./Tenebra 272 4/-1/7500/-1/false/Oh, great!!

Entries.123458546/n DurinsRestMuseum: continue/19 11/farmer 3 13 0 Gunther 8 12 3/Move farmer 5 0 0/Move Gunther 0 0 2/speak Gunther "Well now I know that strange dream has merit. The shadowy figure from my dream said you'd show up and here you are!#$b#Maybe that means the rest of their strange instructions might be true as well... They said there's a book on this shelf that will contain... Well would you look at that... $l",pause 1000/showFrame Gunther 1/showFrame Gunther 2/showFrame Gunther 3/pause 3000/showFrame Gunther 0/speak Gunther "There's a... totem? In here? I swear nobody was in here... How did this totem get inside this book? Well, they said you'd know how to use it...#$b#Good luck on your journey! If you find anything worthy of a museum out there be sure to bring it back here! $l"/Move farmer -5 0 0/end

{{spacechase0.JsonAssets/WeaponId:Xalibu: Do you think it was harder to put this thing into the stone to begin with or to pull it out? Either way, it's in amazing condition for being lodged in a stone for centuries... Blocking with this weapon causes and arc of three fireballs to be thrown forward!

{{spacechase0.JsonAssets/WeaponId:Shadow: Forged out of pure darkness, this short dagger turns the wielder into a lightning fast blade of vengeance for all the atrocities committed against the shadow people. Blocking with this weapon calls down a bolt of lightning!
